text: "Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough" is a classic song by American singer Michael Jackson from his 1979 album Off the Wall. It's one of his most iconic tracks, showcasing his signature blend of disco and pop. The song features an infectious groove, upbeat lyrics about perseverance and desire, and is recognized for its lively production and Jackson's impressive vocal performance. == Music video == An accompanying music video for "Don't Stop 'Til You Get Enough" was released in October 1979. The video shows Jackson dancing, as well as being shown in an innovative triplicate, in different color backgrounds. The song also won Jackson his first Grammy Award and American Music Awards.
